title: PIER ORB / bustedupwalkwaythought
description: One wrong step is death, right? Probably death. (This is a conversation with VisCalc on the state of the ruin.)

dialogueTree.title: Visual Calculus: "Woah! What have we here?"

links.title: Visual Calculus: "A bridge with loose nails and rot-i..."
links.text: A bridge with loose nails and rot-infested wood that creaks in the wind. A construction code violation if there ever was one!

links.title: You: "Whatever. Let death come. I'm a Rev..."
links.text: Whatever. Let death come. I'm a Revacholian badass.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Oh, pardon me then. I forgot just h..."
links.text: Oh, pardon me then. I forgot just how *cool* you were.

links.title: Endurance: "You can take those sharp rocks!"
links.text: You can take those sharp rocks!

links.title: You: ""Kim, it looks like we've got a con..."
links.text: "Kim, it looks like we've got a construction code violation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks around. "True,..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks around. "True, they never cleaned up the war damage... The rest of Revachol looks better, though."

links.title: You: ""But lieutenant, think about the sp..."
Kim Kitsuragi: ""The bridge is fine enough. Locals..."
links.text: "The bridge is fine enough. Locals use it all the time, after all. It's nothing to worry about." He adjusts his glasses. "Shall we?"

links.title: You: "Guess I'll have to take my chances."
links.text: Guess I'll have to take my chances.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Guess so. Just be careful out there..."
links.text: Guess so. Just be careful out there! One false step could cost you dearly!
